title: Add a Titleacked
body: Someone hacked my account a few days ago spent my 51,000 something IP on champs and runes, I always saved up my IP for new champions and if I ever wanted to try a champ now I can't. They also changed my runes / masteries which is just annoying. Who the heck does that and no I have never give out my account information, the client said someone has accessed my account and I couldn't figure out who the heck would so assumed it was a glitch next day all of my IP was gone, thank god I had no RP.

replies.body:
Hit up the support team in a support ticket and they should be able to undo all your shit

Side note, I can't help but laugh at the title of that thread, how do you even accomplish that? Mine auto undoes the add a title

Anytime you're worried that your account was hacked, you should immediately take precautions by shooting our account recovery agents a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They're your best and only method of recovering an account that was hacked.
